solution_line_template: Jill bought {red_packs} packs * {balls_per_pack} red balls = <<{red_packs}*{balls_per_pack}={red_balls}>>{red_balls} red balls.
Jill bought {yellow_packs} packs * {balls_per_pack} yellow balls = <<{yellow_packs}*{balls_per_pack}={yellow_balls}>>{yellow_balls} red balls.
Jill had {red_balls} red - {yellow_balls} yellow = <<{red_balls}-{yellow_balls}={difference_red_yellow}>>{difference_red_yellow} more red balls.
